summary: In this sequel to "Black God, White Devil", Antonio das Mortes must return back to action after killing the last of the Cangaceiros 29 years ago, when a new outlaw appears, who will eventually reveal as an idealist and mark him profoundly.
cast: Maurício do Valle|Odete Lara|Othon Bastos|Hugo Carvana|Joffre Soares|Lorival Pariz|Rosa Maria Penna|Emmanuel Cavalcanti|Vinícius Salvatori|Mário Gusmão|Santi Scaldaferri|Paulo Lima|Conceição Senna
title: Antonio das Mortes
